Description: Production server 64GB RAM 2x Intel Xeon Silver
Sizing_Notes: Small: 50-100 users, Medium: 100-500 users, Large: 500+ users with high-availability requirements
Small: Single switch, Medium/Large: Redundant pair for high availability
HA pair required for all sizes to ensure zero downtime during maintenance
Small/Medium: Single array, Large: Dual arrays for data redundancy

Description: Uninterruptible power supply with battery backup
Sizing_Notes: One UPS per equipment rack, scales with number of racks
Small: 1 instance (24x7), Medium: 2 instances, Large: 6 instances for distributed workload

Description: 1TB SSD premium storage with high IOPS
Sizing_Notes: Small: 1TB, Medium: 2TB, Large: 6TB for application and database storage

Description: Standard tier load balancer with HA support
Sizing_Notes: Required for all sizes to distribute traffic across multiple instances
Standard VPN gateway for hybrid connectivity to on-premises systems

Description: Web application firewall with SSL offloading
Sizing_Notes: Not needed for Small, required for Medium/Large for web security

Description: Object storage for backups and archives
Sizing_Notes: Small: 500GB, Medium: 2TB, Large: 10TB for backup retention
Standard managed database service, same tier for all sizes with different data volumes

Description: Server operating system with unlimited VMs
Sizing_Notes: Per physical server licensing, perpetual license
Per CPU socket licensing, 2 sockets per server

Description: Enterprise productivity suite with advanced security
Sizing_Notes: Small: 50 users, Medium: 200 users, Large: 600+ users typical for enterprise
Approximately 20% of M365 users typically need DevOps platform access
Per-core licensing, 2 cores per VM typical configuration
Per workload instance licensing, scales with number of VMs
Small: 5GB/day, Medium: 20GB/day, Large: 50GB/day log ingestion
DevOps team size scales with organization complexity
Covers all Dell servers, storage, and network equipment

Sizing_Notes: Covers all Cisco network infrastructure devices
